mapper.insert: INSERT INTO article ( wid,uid,title,tag, introduction,conten,cover, is_delete,Hotlist,mun,commentID, created_user, created_time, modified_user, modified_time ) VALUES ( #{wid},#{uid},#{title},#{tag}, #{introduction},#{conten},#{cover}, #{isDelete},#{Hotlist},#{mun},#{commentID}, #{createdUser}, #{createdTime}, #{modifiedUser}, #{modifiedTime} )
mapper.select: SELECT wid,uid,title,tag, introduction,conten,cover, is_delete AS isDelete, Hotlist,mun,commentID, created_user AS createdUser, created_time AS createdTime, modified_user AS modifiedUser, modified_time AS modifiedTime FROM article ORDER BY createdTime DESC

SELECT wid,uid,title,tag, introduction,conten,cover, is_delete AS isDelete, Hotlist,mun,commentID, created_user AS createdUser, created_time AS createdTime, modified_user AS modifiedUser, modified_time AS modifiedTime FROM article WHERE wid=#{wid}

SELECT wid,uid,title,tag, introduction,conten,cover, is_delete AS isDelete, Hotlist,mun,commentID, created_user AS createdUser, created_time AS createdTime, modified_user AS modifiedUser, modified_time AS modifiedTime FROM article WHERE tag= #{tag} ORDER BY createdTime DESC

SELECT wid,uid,title,tag, introduction,conten,cover, is_delete AS isDelete, Hotlist,mun,commentID, created_user AS createdUser, created_time AS createdTime, modified_user AS modifiedUser, modified_time AS modifiedTime FROM article WHERE Hotlist = 1 ORDER BY createdTime DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE article SET title=#{title}, tag=#{tag}, introduction=#{introduction}, conten=#{conten}, cover=#{cover}, created_user =#{createdUser}, created_time =#{createdTime}, modified_user=#{modifiedUser}, modified_time=#{modifiedTime} WHERE wid=#{wid}
